projectCreation() - Static method in class ui.GreenSQASystem
This method creates a proyect, it asks the user for the name of the proyect, the name of the client, the date planed for the beginning of the proyect, the date planed for the end of the proyect, the value of the budget, and the name and corresponding phone number of the proyect managers from boath sides (client and company).

R

regCapsule(int, String, int, String, String, String, String, String, String, String) - Method in class model.Projects
This method is used to register a capsule in a stage of a project
registerCapsule() - Static method in class ui.GreenSQASystem
This method registers a capsule, it asks the user for the name of the proyect, the stage in which the capsule will be registered, the type of capsule (tecnical, managment, domain, or experiences), a unique identifier, a description of the capsule, the name of the collaborator who registered the capsule, the date of the capsule, and the situation and lesson learned from the capsule the inputed text on the lesson must have the keywords between hashtags (#)
registerCapsule(String, int, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, int) - Static method in class model.Green
Method that calls the register capsule method from the Projects class after it finds the project
